title: A proposal for amending the silver coins of England, and the possibility of it, without any great charge to the nation. Demonstrated in two different ways.
author: Neale, Thomas, d. 1699?
publisher: printed for the author, and are to be sold by R. Baldwin, near the Oxford-Arms in Warwick-lane,
notes: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
